document.full_text: finnish voters threw sand in the gears of european union plans to bail out portugal on sunday by thrusting the anti-euro true finns party into a crucial role in parliament and possibly into government.
document.title: populist party surges in finn poll, eu aid at risk
lines_and_colors: finnish voters threw sand in the gears of european union plans to bail out portugal on sunday by thrusting the anti-euro true finns party into a crucial role in parliament and possibly into government.
